list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make fun of or attempt to provoke (a person or animal) in a playful way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy chỉ đang trêu chọc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: gently pull or comb (tangled wool, hair, etc.) into separate strands.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she was teasing out the curls into her usual hairstyle
